{{All Schemes to Know Explanation|name=Collingwood}}
{{Dialogue Start}}
:'''Collingwood:''' (I'm going to drink myself to death someday like this... Ah, forget it. If I die, I die. I'll drink to that!)

==Dialogue==
{{Dialogue Start}}
:'''Collingwood:''' Sober up? Not gonna happen. Drinking too much may hurt my liver, but drinking too little wounds my heart.
:'''Collingwood:''' Ha, it's a toughie, but not drinking just ain't an option.
{{Dialogue End}}
